text: On kasonero, ki nohaq dar rui zamin sarkasi mekunand, ʙa zudi az fahmi ojoti xes va dalelhoe, ki ʙar ʙuzurgii Man va sari'at va ahkomi Man dalolat mekunand, dilhojasonro ʙozdoram, cunon ki har ojatero, ki ʙuʙinand, (ki iʙodat ʙa cuz Alloh ʙa kase sazovor nest), ʙa saʙaʙi kiʙrason imon najovarand va agar tariqi hidojat ʙuʙinand, az on naravand va agar rohi gumrohi ʙuʙinand, az on ʙiravand va onro ʙaroi xud din girand. Zero inho ojotro duruƣ ʙarovardand va az on ƣaflat varzidand va tafakkur dar ojoti Alloh namekunand va iʙrat namegirand
